com.lukflug.panelstudio.component

Class FixedComponent<T extends IComponent>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.ComponentProxy<T>
      • com.lukflug.panelstudio.component.FixedComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the component type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IComponentProxy<T>, IFixedComponent, IPopup
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PopupComponent

    public class FixedComponent<T extends IComponent>
extends ComponentProxy<T>
implements IFixedComponent
    Class wrapping a generic component into a fixed component.

        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to be wrapped
        position - the position of the component
        width - the width of the component
        state - the boolean config state of the component
        savesState - whether this fixed component should save the state via saveConfig(IInterface, IPanelConfig)
        configName - the config name of this component
